detail_desc: Knee-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist. Satin lining.
Fine-knit cotton jumper in a relaxed fit with ribbed panels at the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in soft silk with a high, elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs.
Short jacket in an airy, patterned weave with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. No fasteners.
Make-up bag in transparent, patterned plastic with a zip at the top that continues half-way down each short side. Unlined. Size 8.5x10x18 cm.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
KATE MORGAN x H&M. Skirt in mesh covered in shiny sequins that create a pattern. Glittery elastic waistband. Underskirt in woven fabric.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Straight-cut shirt in a viscose weave with a gently tapered waist, narrow turn-down collar and classic front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Set with a hooded jacket and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. Jacket with a pile-lined hood, zip down the front and heart-shaped front pockets. Joggers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short, wide jumper in soft, rib-knit chenille rib with dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves.
Joggers in soft, airy, patterned viscose jersey with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with a ribbed drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Hat in paper straw containing glittery threads with embroidery, appliqués and a twisted band. Width of brim 9 cm.

Wedge-heel sandals in imitation suede with elasticated straps that cross over the foot, covered toes and a braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 3 cm, heel 5.5 cm.
Socks in a soft, fine knit containing glittery thread with roll edges at the top.
Jumper in a soft, chunky knit with a ribbed polo neck. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave. High waist with covered elastication.
Jacket in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Three with a print motif.
Dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow elastication and a wide flounce at the top, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Thin metal chain necklaces with pendants. Adjustable length 40-48 cm.
Metal fancy dress mask with a punched pattern and sparkly stones. Ties at the back.

Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made from recycled polyester, and patterned soles.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapering legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with plastic beads. Length from 4 cm to 5.5 cm.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Small straw bag with two handles at the top, an imitation leather shoulder strap and a sewn-in lining with a drawstring at the top. Size approx. 15x20x24 cm.
High-waisted lace and microfibre briefs. Wide elastication at the waist with an opening at the back, a lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Blouse in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, pleats down the front and an opening at the back with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons.
TOCA LIFE x H&M. Patterned joggers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and legs with contrasting colour side stripes and ribbed hems.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Jacket in soft, thermal fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Unlined.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with a rounded collar and button placket, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist with a tie detail, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Aviator style glasses with metal frames and clear lenses.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Shorts in cotton piqué with an elasticated, drawstring waist and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Top in a cotton rustle weave with smocking front and back, short puff sleeves with elastication and a frill, and a concealed zip at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Trousers in different colours of cotton twill with a zip fly, button at the waist, front and back pockets and straight legs.

Hooded jacket and pair of trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric. Jacket with a small glittery print at the top, concealed zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets, dropped shoulders and pile sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Short, circular skirt woven in an airy linen blend with a concealed zip at the waist and a gathered seam at the hips. Lined.

Short, fitted dress in imitation leather with a wide, detachable belt at the waist. Collar, concealed press-studs down the front, a yoke front and back, flap chest pockets and front pockets. Long sleeves and cuffs with concealed press-studs. Unlined.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, leg pockets and fake welt back pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening.

Set with a dress, gilet and tights. Dress in a patterned weave with buttons down the back, a gathered seam at the waist and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Faux fur gilet with a concealed button at the top. Lined. Fine-knit tights in a cotton blend.
Short top in an airy weave with a sheen. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide flounce at the top.
Waistcoat in twill made from a viscose blend with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined. The polyester content of the waistcoat is recycled.
Dress in a double-layered cotton weave with embroidery on the shoulders, a decorative bow at the neck, a small opening with a button at the back of the neck, and long raglan sleeves. Unlined.
Beret in fine-knit wool containing some nylon.
A-line strappy top in a jacquard weave with a small opening at the back. Narrow cut at the top with a frill trim and drawstring at the top that ties at the back of the neck. Lined.
V-neck cardigan in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Long dress in matt, leopard-print silk with an opening and concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top, long, wide sleeves and narrow cuffs with a concealed zip. Seam at the waist with pleats and a gently bell-shaped, softly draping skirt with a slit at the front and an asymmetric hem. Lined.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back, and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in soft double-weave organic cotton with short, flounced sleeves, buttons down the front and elasticated hems.
Fitted dress in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Bootees in soft fabric with ribbing at the top and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.

Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with side pockets and wide elastication with a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Hair elastics.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Straight-cut top in cotton jersey with and opening and button at the back of the neck, a cut-out section with drawstring at the shoulders and short sleeves.

Long, wide dress in a cool viscose weave with a slight sheen. V-neck, a yoke at the back, gathered seams on the shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Gathered seam under the bust and on the skirt. Unlined.
Trousers in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and short legs. Press-studs down the front and along one leg.
Legs in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood and zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves, front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Socks in textured-knit cotton with rib-knit, fold-down shafts.
Shorts in printed lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Trainers in patterned cotton canvas with sequins, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
